4_key_decisions_rationale.title: Key Decisions & Rationale
4_key_decisions_rationale.content:
1. **Placement after Database-Only section** - Logical flow from enforcement to communication
2. **≤500 token default** - Balances brevity with usefulness, allows override when needed
3. **Table format for examples** - Visual clarity for do/don't patterns
4. **'Summarize > Paste' principle** - Reduces context bloat immediately
5. **File:line reference pattern** - Industry standard, IDE-compatible
6. **Batch reading guidance** - Reduces API calls and round-trips
7. **Archive to handoffs** - Leverages existing 7-element structure

5_known_issues_risks.title: Known Issues & Risks
5_known_issues_risks.content:
**Known Issues:**
1. No enforcement mechanism - relies on voluntary compliance
2. 500 token budget may be too restrictive for complex tasks
3. No metrics to track adoption

**Risks:**
1. May reduce helpful detail in responses
2. Could increase follow-up questions if too terse
3. Batch reading might miss related context

**Mitigations:**
1. 'Unless complexity requires more' escape clause
2. Examples show balanced approach
3. Monitor user feedback for adjustment
